channel.title: CVE Feed for Techeshta -- Post Layouts for Gutenberg
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Techeshta -- Post Layouts for Gutenberg

item.title: CVE-2024-38682|2024-08-02T04:19:19.424Z -- techeshta -- post%20layouts%20for%20gutenberg
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Techeshta Post Layouts for Gutenberg allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Post Layouts for Gutenberg: from n/a through 1.2.7.
